results.title: Trump Threatens Federal Intervention in Chicago, Citing ‘Carnage’
results.abstract: Tweeting the latest reported crime statistics in the nation’s third-largest city, the president said he would “send in the Feds!” if the city doesn’t do more.
results.byline: By MONICA DAVEY and NIRAJ CHOKSHI

results.title: Trump Injects High Risk Into Relations With China
